item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将连续第三天下跌
油轮股因特朗普承诺加强对伊朗的限制而大涨
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）挤压伊朗的计划引发了油轮供应收紧的忧虑，进一步提振了因制裁俄罗斯而受到挤压的航运市场，从而提振了航运股。【原文：Shipping stocks received a lift as US President Donald Trump’s plans to squeeze Iran raised the specter of tighter tanker supply, further boosting a market that’s been squeezed by sanctions against Russia.】

item.title: 黄金对央行的吸引力将支撑 2025 年的需求
item.description: 世界黄金协会（World Gold Council）的数据显示，尽管黄金行业今年的贵金属需求量创下了历史新高，但世界各国央行对黄金的需求仍没有放缓的迹象。【原文：The appetite for gold from the world’s central banks shows no signs of slowing, even as the gold industry comes off a record year of demand for the precious metal, according to the World Gold Council.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行在利润创纪录之际推出 100 亿欧元回购计划
item.description: 桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）在再次公布创纪录的利润时表示，打算在未来几年内回购 100 亿欧元（104 亿美元）的股票。【原文：Banco Santander SA said it intends to buy back €10 billion ($10.4 billion) of its shares over the coming years as it posted another record profit.】

item.title: 印度中央银行开放基金账户后现金赤字有所缓解
item.description: 在经济增长乏力的情况下，印度中央银行采取了积极的流动性注入措施，困扰印度银行系统的现金紧缩问题已经缓解了一半以上。【原文：The cash crunch plaguing India’s banking system has more than halved after the central bank took aggressive liquidity injection measures amid faltering economic growth.】

item.title: 菲律宾众议院有足够票数弹劾杜特尔特副总统：DZBB
item.description: 菲律宾当地电台 DZBB 援引众议院秘书长雷金纳德-贝拉斯科（Reginald Velasco）的话报道说，菲律宾众议院已获得足够票数弹劾副总统萨拉-杜特尔特。【原文：The Philippines’ House of Representatives has sufficient votes to impeach Vice President Sara Duterte, local radio DZBB reported, citing House Secretary General Reginald Velasco.】

item.title: 全球债券需求达到澳大利亚，销售额破纪录
item.description: 由于央行政策放宽、通胀放缓和贸易紧张局势刺激了全球新债发行热潮，投资者对澳大利亚新债的需求飙升至创纪录水平。【原文：Investor demand for Australia’s new bond surged to a record as central bank policy easing, moderating inflation and trade tensions spurred a global rush for fresh issuance.】

item.title: 马来西亚国家石油公司（Petronas）与沙捞越州的天然气争端解决方案不包括液化天然气
item.description: 据法律部长阿扎里娜-奥斯曼-赛义德（Azalina Othman Said）称，马来西亚国家石油公司（Petroliam Nasional Bhd.）承认沙捞越石油公司在婆罗洲州的天然气分销商地位，但不包括液化天然气。【原文：Petroliam Nasional Bhd. recognizes the role of Sarawak’s oil firm as the gas distributor in the Borneo state, though it excludes liquefied natural gas, according to Law Minister Azalina Othman Said.】

item.title: 逮捕和司法调查引发对土耳其新一轮镇压的担忧
item.description:
在与库尔德工人党进行和平谈判之前，反对派领导人、记者甚至一名知名特工都卷入了逮捕和调查浪潮。【原文：

Opposition leaders, journalists and even a celebrity agent have been caught up in a wave of arrests and investigations ahead of peace talks with the Kurdish PKK.

】

item.title: 特朗普和习近平玩转孙子贸易战艺术
item.description:
中国可能会发现，即使短期和平协议即将达成，它也无法避免冲突。【原文：

China may find that it’s beyond the point where conflict can be avoided — even if a short-term peace deal is on the horizon.

】

item.title: 增长反弹将延长波兰暂停加息的时间
item.description: 波兰央行很可能会延长暂停加息的时间，因为经济增长的预期反弹使行长亚当-格拉平斯基（Adam Glapinski）认为没有必要减息。【原文：Poland’s central bank will likely prolong an interest-rate pause as an expected rebound in economic growth adds to Governor Adam Glapinski’s arguments against the need for cuts.】

item.title: 被西方避之唯恐不及，津巴布韦的阿联酋赌局为经济带来生机
item.description: 津巴布韦总统埃默森-姆南加古瓦（Emmerson Mnangagwa）六年来一直向阿拉伯联合酋长国示好，为这个被西方排斥了四分之一个世纪、无力偿还中国贷款的国家带来了一线生机。【原文：Zimbabwean President Emmerson Mnangagwa’s six years of wooing the United Arab Emirates has given a lifeline to a nation that the West has ostracized for a quarter century and is unable to repay its loans to China.】

item.title: 阿达尼和塔塔利润不佳，印度股市前景堪忧
item.description: 企业盈利的放缓正在加剧人们对印度 4.1 万亿美元股票市场的新担忧，并有可能破坏印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）为重振经济增长所做的最新努力。【原文：A deepening slowdown in corporate earnings is fueling fresh concern over India’s $4.1 trillion stock market, and threatening to undermine Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s latest efforts to revive growth.】

item.title: 印尼去年经济增长超预期，达 5.03
item.description: 随着出口复苏，印尼第四季度和2024年全年的经济增长速度超过预期，为充满挑战的一年带来了一些增长势头。【原文：Indonesia’s economy expanded faster than expected in the fourth quarter and the full year of 2024 as exports recovered, bringing some growth momentum into a year fraught with challenges.】

item.title: 风险投资支持的初创公司被指敲诈洛杉矶火灾受害者租金
item.description: 市检察官办公室在一项诉讼中称，在上个月的野火烧毁了数千栋房屋之后，一家风险投资支持的初创公司非法抬高了洛杉矶带家具公寓的租金，其中一个例子的涨幅超过了 50%。【原文：A venture capital-backed startup illegally jacked up rents for furnished apartments in Los Angeles — more than 50% in one example — after last month’s wildfires that destroyed thousands of homes, the city attorney’s office alleged in a lawsuit.】

item.title: 小麦创三个月新高，市场期待中美会谈
item.description: 小麦创下了近三个月来的最高点，因为交易商考虑到中国对美国关税的谨慎态度，而市场也在等待世界两大经济体领导人之间可能举行会谈的细节。【原文：Wheat hit the highest in almost three months as traders considered China’s cautious approach to US tariffs, and the market awaited details on possible talks between the leaders of the world’s two biggest economies.】

item.title: 韩国计划设立 230 亿美元基金支持电池和生物技术发展
item.description: 韩国以地缘政治紧张局势加剧和来自中国的竞争为由，计划投资至少 34 万亿韩元（约合 230 亿美元），帮助企业开发电池和生物技术领域的尖端技术。【原文：South Korea aims to invest at least 34 trillion won ($23 billion) to help companies develop cutting-edge technologies in the battery and biotech sectors citing rising geopolitical tensions and competition from China.】

item.title: 全球基金连续 22 天抛售印度股票，创下历史新高
item.description: 由于对盈利放缓和新兴市场轮出的担忧继续拖累市场情绪，全球资产管理公司连续抛售印度股票，创下历史新高。【原文：Global asset managers’ selling spree in Indian shares extended to a record streak, as concerns about earnings slowdown and rotation out of emerging markets continue to weigh on sentiment.】

item.title: 中国市场重开，美元走软，铜价上涨
item.description: 在美元走软的支撑下，铜连续第三天上涨；随着内地市场在农历新年休市后重新开市，交易商正在权衡中美贸易战的影响。【原文：Copper rose for a third day — supported by a weaker dollar — with traders weighing the impact of the US-China trade war as mainland markets reopened following the Lunar New Year break.】

item.title: 安联、IAG 据称酝酿竞购西澳大利亚州顶级保险公司
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，安联 SE 和澳大利亚保险集团有限公司等保险公司正在考虑竞购西澳大利亚州的顶级保险公司。【原文：Insurance firms Allianz SE and Insurance Australia Group Ltd. are among parties considering bidding for Western Australia’s top insurer, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 谢因携安巴尼的信实公司重返印度，创下特伦特股价纪录
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 前谷歌工程师被控在中国从事间谍活动以促进人工智能发展
item.description: 一名曾为 Alphabet 公司旗下谷歌公司工作的中国软件工程师因涉嫌窃取商业机密以推动中国人工智能产业发展而面临美国司法部新的经济间谍指控。【原文：A Chinese software engineer who worked for Alphabet Inc.’s Google faces new charges of economic espionage by the US Justice Department for allegedly stealing trade secrets to boost China’s AI industry.】

item.title: 中国服务业增速意外放缓，尽管假日消费强劲
item.description: 一项民间调查显示，中国服务业活动意外放缓，但延续了连续数月的增长势头，原因是农历新年前后是中国最繁忙的消费旺季之一，为需求提供了支撑。【原文：China’s services activity unexpectedly slowed while extending its monthslong growth streak, a private survey showed, as one of the country’s busiest spending seasons around the Lunar New Year supported demand.】

item.title: 投资者面临关税战，中国股市复盘后下滑
item.description: 中国股市下滑，原因是投资者在结束为期一周的假期返回后对贸易紧张局势加剧做出了反应。【原文：Chinese stocks slipped as investors responded to heightened trade tensions upon their return from a week-long holiday.】

item.title: 美国直接贷款公司门罗资本在澳大利亚开设首家办事处
item.description: 美国私人信贷管理公司门罗资本有限责任公司（Monroe Capital LLC）正在澳大利亚扩张，通过开设新办事处和招聘员工，开发该国快速增长的 4.1 万亿澳元（2.6 万亿美元）养老金池。【原文：Monroe Capital LLC, a US private credit manager, is expanding in Australia to tap the nation’s fast-growing A$4.1 trillion ($2.6 trillion) pensions pool with the opening of a new office and hire.】

item.title: 中国利用液化天然气和钨关税撬动大宗商品市场
item.description: 液化天然气和钨--一种用于国防和能源工业的金属--是中美贸易战开战前线的商品。【原文：Liquefied natural gas and tungsten — a metal used in the defense and energy industries — are the commodities on the front lines of the opening salvo of the US-China trade war.】

item.title: OpenAI 的索拉（Sora）电影制作工具在好莱坞遭遇阻力
item.description: 报纸出版商以数百万美元的价格获得文章授权。唱片公司已经提起诉讼。但在人工智能的商业潜力方面，电影制片厂的起步要慢得多。【原文：Newspaper publishers have licensed articles for millions of dollars. Record labels have filed lawsuits. But when it comes to the commercial potential of artificial intelligence, movie studios are off to a much slower start.】

item.title: 在贸易战中，中国通过每日定盘价维持人民币汇率稳定
item.description: 由于与美国的贸易紧张局势升级加剧了人民币的贬值压力，中国扩大了对人民币的支持，将管理货币的每日参考汇率设定在高于 7.2 美元的水平。【原文：China extended its support for the yuan by setting its daily reference rate for the managed currency at a level stronger than 7.2 per dollar, as escalating trade tensions with the US add to the depreciation pressure on the yuan.】

item.title: 彭博经济学家称澳大利亚降息 "并非一锤定音
item.description: 彭博经济公司（Bloomberg Economics）的詹姆斯-麦金太尔（James McIntyre）认为，澳大利亚稳固的劳动力市场、复苏的消费者、强劲的信贷增长和货币贬值都是储备银行本月降息的潜在障碍。【原文：Australia’s solid labor market, resurgent consumer, robust credit growth and depreciating currency are all potential hurdles to the Reserve Bank lowering interest rates this month, according to James McIntyre at Bloomberg Economics.】

item.title: 印度储备银行新行长颠覆交易员的游戏规则
item.description: 在沙克提坎塔-达斯（Shaktikanta Das）担任印度央行行长的最后两年里，卢比坚挺、流动性不断减少、利率居高不下。桑杰-马尔霍特拉看起来将打破这一模式。【原文：The last two years of Shaktikanta Das’ tenure as India’s central bank chief was marked by a rock-steady rupee, dwindling liquidity and high interest rates. Sanjay Malhotra looks set to break from that template.】
